message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $18000.  This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth your investment. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. While $12000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down a little to $15000 to make this deal work. This reflects the value of the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $13000 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
